column1: His family will receive friends Tuesday
column2: June 23rd from 5-8 pm at the Mystic Funeral Home Route 1 (51 Williams Ave.) Mystic.   Funeral services will begin Wednesday
column3: at 9:15 am from the funeral home followed by a mass at 10:00 am at St. Mary Church 95 Main St. Stonington. Burial will follow at Elm Grove Cemetery Route 27 Mystic.
